title: Haitian row: Photographer of viral 'man carrying duck' says he thought it was...
content: The man who took the viral photo of a man carrying a duck came forward and claimed that the photo was not from Springfield but from Ohio's Columbus. He said he regrets posting the photo on Reddit as it became the weapon of the Right-wingers to spread the malicious rumors about Haitian immigrants. He said he posted the photo as he thought it was not something one gets to see every day.
summary: The man who took the viral photo of a man carrying a duck came forward and claimed that the photo was not from Springfield but from Ohio's Columbus. He said he regrets posting the photo on Reddit as it became the weapon of the Right-wingers to spread the malicious rumors about Haitian immigrants. He said he posted the photo as he thought it was not something one gets to see every day.

title: John Legend says 'nobody eating cats' in Ohio's Springfield: 'I am from there'
content: Singer John Legend said he was born in Ohio's Springfield and knows the demography well enough to confirm that nobody is eating cats and dogs there. The Haitians migrated and settled in Springfield because they found jobs there and immigrants in the US generally do well, they are hard working, John Legend said.
summary: Singer John Legend said he was born in Ohio's Springfield and knows the demography well enough to confirm that nobody is eating cats and dogs there. The Haitians migrated and settled in Springfield because they found jobs there and immigrants in the US generally do well, they are hard working, John Legend said.

title: Laura Loomer doubles down on Kamala Harris, calls her 'evil bimbo': 'Respect is earned'
content: Facing flak for her racist attack on Kamala Harris, Laura Loomer Friday did not take a step back. She insisted that she considers Kamala Harris as an evil bimbo who is not eligible to be the president. The conspiracy theorist, in her latest X post, also suggested that Joe Biden-Kamala Harris administration incited the assassination attempt of Donald Trump.
summary: Facing flak for her racist attack on Kamala Harris, Laura Loomer Friday did not take a step back. She insisted that she considers Kamala Harris as an evil bimbo who is not eligible to be the president. The conspiracy theorist, in her latest X post, also suggested that Joe Biden-Kamala Harris administration incited the assassination attempt of Donald Trump.

title: Stormy Daniels says Trump never wanted to be president, he wants...
content: Stormy Daniels fears that Donald Trump might charge her with treason if he is re-elected, following her testimony against him in the hush-money case. But her feelings towards Trump are somewhat complex, she said. She hates Donald Trump but does not think that Trump also hates her. But she's certain that Trump hates the situation that she has put him in.
summary: Stormy Daniels fears that Donald Trump might charge her with treason if he is re-elected, following her testimony against him in the hush-money case. But her feelings towards Trump are somewhat complex, she said. She hates Donald Trump but does not think that Trump also hates her. But she's certain that Trump hates the situation that she has put him in.

title: Did Biden ask for the Trump cap? Viral video answers it wasn't offered to him
content: At a 9/11 anniversary event in Pennsylvania, President Joe Biden donned a Trump 2024 cap as a gesture of unity. A viral video shows him interacting with a Trump supporter, exchanging hats, and making humorous remarks. The White House clarified that the act aimed to symbolize national unity.
summary: At a 9/11 anniversary event in Pennsylvania, President Joe Biden donned a Trump 2024 cap as a gesture of unity. A viral video shows him interacting with a Trump supporter, exchanging hats, and making humorous remarks. The White House clarified that the act aimed to symbolize national unity.

title: Haitian immigrant pet-eating row: Ohio woman accused of eating cat is US citizen; video is from Canton, not Springfield
content: A case where a woman allegedly killed and ate a cat has been wrongly linked to Haitian immigrants, causing political uproar. Authorities confirmed the accused is a US citizen with no immigrant connections. Despite this, Trump and Vance echoed these false claims, spreading misinformation and fueling controversy.
summary: A case where a woman allegedly killed and ate a cat has been wrongly linked to Haitian immigrants, causing political uproar. Authorities confirmed the accused is a US citizen with no immigrant connections. Despite this, Trump and Vance echoed these false claims, spreading misinformation and fueling controversy.

title: Kamala Harris campaign calls Trump a ‘chicken’ after he backs out of third debate
content: Donald Trump announced there would be no third debate with Kamala Harris, leading to mockery from her campaign and social media users. Trump cited his previous debate performance as a reason for his decision, while criticizing Harris and Joe Biden. This move sparked widespread ridicule and raised questions about his commitment to future debates.
summary: Donald Trump announced there would be no third debate with Kamala Harris, leading to mockery from her campaign and social media users. Trump cited his previous debate performance as a reason for his decision, while criticizing Harris and Joe Biden. This move sparked widespread ridicule and raised questions about his commitment to future debates.

title: Prince Harry’s 40th: ‘Completely isolated’ and ‘No sign of an official role in Royal family’ — What’s next for the Duke?
content: Prince Harry's 40th birthday highlights growing rifts with the UK public and his family. Residing in California with Meghan Markle and their children, he is distanced from his royal roots. Tensions have escalated since stepping back from royal duties, leaving reconciliation prospects dim as both sides navigate their strained relationship.
summary: Prince Harry's 40th birthday highlights growing rifts with the UK public and his family. Residing in California with Meghan Markle and their children, he is distanced from his royal roots. Tensions have escalated since stepping back from royal duties, leaving reconciliation prospects dim as both sides navigate their strained relationship.

title: Indian-origin ex-South African finance minister Pravin Gordhan dies at 75 after battle with cancer
content: Pravin Gordhan, South Africa's former Finance Minister, has died at age 75 from cancer. A key political figure since the nation's democratic transition in 1994, he held numerous important roles. President Cyril Ramaphosa expressed sorrow over his death, commending Gordhan's integrity and service to the country.
summary: Pravin Gordhan, South Africa's former Finance Minister, has died at age 75 from cancer. A key political figure since the nation's democratic transition in 1994, he held numerous important roles. President Cyril Ramaphosa expressed sorrow over his death, commending Gordhan's integrity and service to the country.

title: Prince Harry set to pocket £7 million on his 40th birthday tax-free! Here's how he escapes HMRC
content: Prince Harry is about to receive £7 million from the late Queen Mother's trust fund without incurring inheritance tax, thanks to strategic financial planning. His share exceeds Prince William's due to the Royal Family's financial structure, which ensures efficient wealth transfer across generations.
summary: Prince Harry is about to receive £7 million from the late Queen Mother's trust fund without incurring inheritance tax, thanks to strategic financial planning. His share exceeds Prince William's due to the Royal Family's financial structure, which ensures efficient wealth transfer across generations.

title: Russia accuses 6 British officials of 'spying and subversive activities', expels them
content: The Russian FSB has accused six British diplomats of espionage, resulting in their expulsion and revocation of accreditation. This development occurs during UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer's visit to Washington for talks with President Joe Biden about Ukraine. The FSB claims the diplomats were involved in intelligence gathering and subversive activities against Russia.
summary: The Russian FSB has accused six British diplomats of espionage, resulting in their expulsion and revocation of accreditation. This development occurs during UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer's visit to Washington for talks with President Joe Biden about Ukraine. The FSB claims the diplomats were involved in intelligence gathering and subversive activities against Russia.

title: Germany fact-checks Trump amid energy policy debate: 'PS: We also don't eat cats and dogs'
content: Germany has rebutted former President Donald Trump's claims about its renewable energy system, stating that over 50% of its energy comes from renewables. The country is shutting down coal and nuclear plants, aiming to phase out coal by 2038 and achieve majority renewable energy consumption by 2050. Germany also addressed misinformation with facts.
summary: Germany has rebutted former President Donald Trump's claims about its renewable energy system, stating that over 50% of its energy comes from renewables. The country is shutting down coal and nuclear plants, aiming to phase out coal by 2038 and achieve majority renewable energy consumption by 2050. Germany also addressed misinformation with facts.

title: Trump's 'Haitians are eating dogs. They are eating the cats' claim inspires viral TikTok song, internet reacts
content: Donald Trump's false statement during a presidential debate that Haitian immigrants in Springfield, Ohio, were eating pets has gone viral. Debunked by ABC moderator David Muir, the claim was initially spread by JD Vance. This has led to a TikTok trend and memes focusing on The Simpsons' fictional hometown.
summary: Donald Trump's false statement during a presidential debate that Haitian immigrants in Springfield, Ohio, were eating pets has gone viral. Debunked by ABC moderator David Muir, the claim was initially spread by JD Vance. This has led to a TikTok trend and memes focusing on The Simpsons' fictional hometown.

title: Who was Kristina Joksimovic? Former Miss Switzerland finalist whose husband 'pureed' her chopped body parts using hand blender
content: Kristina Joksimovic, a former Miss Switzerland finalist, was murdered by her husband in Binningen, Switzerland. He confessed to the crime after initially claiming self-defense. The court ruling revealed shocking details of the murder and rejected his appeal for release. The crime has left their two daughters without their mother.
summary: Kristina Joksimovic, a former Miss Switzerland finalist, was murdered by her husband in Binningen, Switzerland. He confessed to the crime after initially claiming self-defense. The court ruling revealed shocking details of the murder and rejected his appeal for release. The crime has left their two daughters without their mother.

title: Georgia shool shooting: GBI reveals shocking new details from Apalachee high attack - '14-year-old managed to conceal weapon inside ...'
content: The Georgia Bureau of Investigation has unveiled details regarding the Apalachee High School shooting where 14-year-old Colt Gray killed two students and two teachers. Both Colt and his father, Colin Gray, face charges. This is the first instance in Georgia where a parent is charged in connection with a school shooting.
summary: The Georgia Bureau of Investigation has unveiled details regarding the Apalachee High School shooting where 14-year-old Colt Gray killed two students and two teachers. Both Colt and his father, Colin Gray, face charges. This is the first instance in Georgia where a parent is charged in connection with a school shooting.

title: Who is Jose Lopez? New York City inmate escapes from custody after virtual appearance before judge
content: Jose Lopez managed to escape from a Bronx hospital minutes after appearing virtually before a judge. He faced multiple charges related to an August incident involving reckless driving and drug possession. With a criminal record dating back to 2008, police are now asking for public assistance in locating him.
summary: Jose Lopez managed to escape from a Bronx hospital minutes after appearing virtually before a judge. He faced multiple charges related to an August incident involving reckless driving and drug possession. With a criminal record dating back to 2008, police are now asking for public assistance in locating him.

title: Nasa explains why keeping Sunita Williams, Butch Wilmore off Starliner was the 'right decision'
content: Boeing's Starliner capsule completed its mission with a successful landing in New Mexico, despite numerous technical issues. Initially meant to return NASA astronauts from the ISS, safety concerns prompted their return on a SpaceX Crew Dragon in 2025. The mission provided valuable insights but highlighted ongoing challenges for Boeing.
summary: Boeing's Starliner capsule completed its mission with a successful landing in New Mexico, despite numerous technical issues. Initially meant to return NASA astronauts from the ISS, safety concerns prompted their return on a SpaceX Crew Dragon in 2025. The mission provided valuable insights but highlighted ongoing challenges for Boeing.

title: 'Will be fighting directly with Russia if ...': Putin's stark warning to West
content: Vladimir Putin warned that if Ukraine is allowed to use Western long-range missiles against Russian territory, it would mean direct involvement of Nato countries in the conflict. He emphasized that this decision would change the nature of the war and force Russia to take appropriate measures, highlighting Nato's role in missile targeting support.
summary: Vladimir Putin warned that if Ukraine is allowed to use Western long-range missiles against Russian territory, it would mean direct involvement of Nato countries in the conflict. He emphasized that this decision would change the nature of the war and force Russia to take appropriate measures, highlighting Nato's role in missile targeting support.

title: Kamala Harris' reaction to Trump’s Taliban comments sparks viral debate: Was she about to curse?
content: Vice President Kamala Harris was caught on video nearly cursing former President Donald Trump during a debate, leading to a flurry of social media reactions. The incident occurred as Harris criticized Trump's controversial 2019 invitation to Taliban leaders for peace talks at Camp David, bypassing the Afghan government. Her visible frustration became a focal point for online discussions.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris was caught on video nearly cursing former President Donald Trump during a debate, leading to a flurry of social media reactions. The incident occurred as Harris criticized Trump's controversial 2019 invitation to Taliban leaders for peace talks at Camp David, bypassing the Afghan government. Her visible frustration became a focal point for online discussions.

title: Elon Musk labels Australia's government 'fascists' over proposed misinformation fines
content: Elon Musk labeled Australia's center-left government as 'fascists' after it proposed fines for internet platforms failing to curb misinformation. The new law mandates platforms to establish codes of conduct or face penalties, aiming for greater transparency and accountability. This has ignited criticism and debate among Australian lawmakers.
summary: Elon Musk labeled Australia's center-left government as 'fascists' after it proposed fines for internet platforms failing to curb misinformation. The new law mandates platforms to establish codes of conduct or face penalties, aiming for greater transparency and accountability. This has ignited criticism and debate among Australian lawmakers.
